hero_solucion_subtitle:
Secure and scalable platform to create customized wallets
for companies with marketplace and loyalty programs
fin_tech_description_1: CADIPEL designs and implements virtual wallets through Open-All, enabling companies to operate their own payment and digital balance ecosystem with operational and business control.
fin_tech_description_2: The solution integrates with existing accounting and commercial systems (ERP / POS / e-commerce), directly or via APIs, with a focus on security, traceability and scalability.
fin_tech_problem_2: Dependence on third parties for payment experience
fin_tech_problem_4: Lack of actionable data on customer behavior
fin_tech_problem_6: Limitations for scoring models and personalized offers
fin_tech_problem_7: Fragmented integration with commercial partners or sales networks
fin_tech_platform_item_1: Open-All platform as transactional and administrative core
fin_tech_platform_item_2: API integration with e-commerce, marketplace, ERP and CRM
fin_tech_platform_item_3: Control backoffice (users, merchants, balances, rules, reports)
fin_tech_platform_item_4: Business governance: rules, limits, campaigns, permissions and auditing
fin_tech_services_item_1: Discovery and functional design (scope, flows, roles, rules)
fin_tech_benefits_item_4: Advanced analytics for business and marketing
